definition.text: In this tutorial I'll show you how the layers of the Trading Bot work! I mean the ones featured on charts, associated with all types of trading sessions!

paragraphs.text: Let's get on with it! The Trading Bot outputs dozens of products, and they're all featured in three separate Layer Managers:
Trading Engine: features layers that turn on and off the reporting of values of nodes in the Trading Engine hierarchy.
Trading System: features layers that turn on and off multiple types of reports at the level of the Trading System.
Simulation Objects: features layers that affect the rendering of visual information over the charts.
